hero.name: Abdeltawab Sha`ban
hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.description: I create modern, responsive web applications using React and Next.js

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I'm Abdeltawab Sha`ban, a 27-year-old front-end developer from Egypt. With hands-on experience in building dynamic user interfaces and an online store using ReactJS, I'm passionate about learning and continuously evolving to stand out in the competitive tech industry, prove my worth, and leave a strong impact.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Let's work together on your next project

hero.title: Let's Work Together
hero.subtitle: Ready to bring your ideas to life? I'm here to help you create amazing digital experiences.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Feel free to reach out through any of these channels. I'm always excited to discuss new opportunities and projects.
